paper_abstract: We study the characteristics of straight skeletons of monotone polygonal chains and use them to devise an algorithm for computing positively weighted straight skeletons of monotone polygons. Our algorithm runs in O(n logn) time and O(n) space, where n denotes the number of vertices of the polygon. (C) 2014 The Authors. Published by Elsevier B.V.
paper_title: A simple algorithm for computing positively weighted straight skeletons of monotone polygons
